function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Poor indoor air quality leading to health issues","Impact":"Asthma, throat pain, shortness of breath, heart diseases, cancer, chronic lung diseases, bronchitis","Mitigation":"Regular monitoring of indoor air quality, use of air purifiers, proper ventilation systems","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, air purifiers, HVAC systems","People":"Occupants of buildings","Owner":"Building owners and facility managers"},{"Description":"Suboptimal levels of IEQ variables in buildings","Impact":"Unsafe buildings, poor health, learning difficulties, productivity issues","Mitigation":"Regular assessment of IEQ variables, implementation of appropriate building design and maintenance","Technologies":"IEQ monitoring systems, building management systems, smart building technologies","People":"Occupants of buildings","Owner":"Building owners and facility managers"},{"Description":"Challenges in ensuring high IEQ levels during the COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission, compromised health and well-being of occupants","Mitigation":"Enhanced ventilation and filtration systems, implementation of infection control measures, use of air purification technologies","Technologies":"High-efficiency air filters, UV germicidal irradiation, smart HVAC systems","People":"Occupants of buildings","Owner":"Building owners and facility managers"}]}
